mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rpt_search( keyword, srhTime, srhType, officeId, remarks ) VALUES ( #{keyword}, #{srhTime}, #{srhType}, #{officeId}, #{remarks} )
mapper.select: SELECT v.keyword FROM ( SELECT t.keyword AS keyword, count(t.keyword) AS kwCount FROM RPT_SEARCH t WHERE t.srhtime<=#{endTime} AND t.srhtime>=#{beginTime} GROUP BY t.keyword ORDER BY kwCount DESC ) v WHERE ROWNUM<=10

SELECT v.officeName FROM ( SELECT t.officeid AS officeId,t.name AS officeName,COUNT(t.officeid) AS oiCount FROM ( SELECT s.officeid AS officeid, o.name AS name FROM RPT_SEARCH s, SYS_OFFICE o WHERE s.officeid = o.id AND s.srhtime<=#{endTime} AND s.srhtime>=#{beginTime} ) t GROUP BY t.officeid,t.name ORDER BY oiCount desc) v WHERE ROWNUM<=10

SELECT v.srhTime,v.srhCount,srhType FROM ( SELECT to_char(r.srhtime,'yyyy-mm') AS srhTime,count(1) AS srhCount,r.srhtype AS srhType FROM rpt_search r GROUP BY to_char(r.srhtime,'yyyy-mm') ,r.srhtype ORDER BY r.srhtype ASC ) v WHERE ROWNUM<=#{rshCount}
SELECT ''''||rshTime||'''' FROM ( SELECT to_char(r.srhtime,'yyyy-mm') AS rshTime FROM rpt_search r GROUP BY to_char(r.srhtime,'yyyy-mm') ORDER BY rshTime ) v WHERE ROWNUM<=6

SELECT r.srhType FROM rpt_search r WHERE to_char(r.srhtime,'yyyy-mm') IN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT to_char(r.srhtime,'yyyy-mm') AS rshTime FROM rpt_search r GROUP BY to_char(r.srhtime,'yyyy-mm') ORDER BY rshTime DESC ) v WHERE ROWNUM<=6 ) GROUP BY r.srhtype ORDER BY r.srhtype
